item.title: Hi, I'm Kerem Kayabay
item.description: I am a researcher and developer interested in data and data-driven organizations. My research questions look like: How do businesses link data products (e.g., insights, recommendations, visualizations) to business drivers? How do they manage their technology stack for data science projects? What can help transform traditional organizations to use data more effectively? Whenever I find the time, I develop open-source projects. These projects address the following problems: I want control over the data and functionality.
